thread.title: Big Brother's Ryan Ruckledge 'having a baby boy' with Hughie Maughan
thread.title_full: Big Brother's Ryan Ruckledge 'having a baby boy' with Hughie Maughan

title: Big Brother's Ryan Ruckledge 'having a baby boy' with Hughie Maughan
text:
BABY ON THE WAY?: Ryan said him and Hughie are having a child 
The 24-year-old Big Brother star revealed the news in an Instagram photo. 
He was seen in the snap posing for a mirror selfie with Hughie, who had his hands around a 'bump' on Ryan's stomach. 
The Blackpool lad captioned the photo: "Happy to announce that me and Hughie are having a child so excited." Big Brother babe Charlie Doherty in Magaluf Thursday, 8th September 2016 Big Brother babe Charlie Doherty shows off her figure in Magaluf. 1 / 23 Exclusivepix Media Busty Charlie Doherty collapses with laughter during a very wet and hot foam party in Magaluf 
INSTAGRAM GOT A NAME: Ryan said they'd call the baby boy Phoenix Maughan “Happy to announce that me and Hughie are having a child” Instagram 
He even later revealed that the couple had a name for the child, adding: "We are calling him Phoenix Maughan. 
Some fans congratulated the stars, with one writing: "So happy for you." 
Another added: "Aww cute." 
CHANNEL 5/WENN BIG BROTHER: The pair met on the show 
Others were confused whether the star was being serious, with one writing: "Big lunch then? Lol." 
Another asked: "You gonna push it out of your bum crack?" 
The announcement comes after Ryan caused a stir on Twitter last week when he got confused between Barrack Obama and Osama Bin Laden. 
TWITTER ERROR: Ryan recently mistook Barrack Obama for Osama Bin Laden 
During Donald Trump's presidential inauguration, he tweeted: "If everyone's moaning that Donald Trump is prime minister, then why did everyone vote him and not vote for Osama – everyone's fault surely?" 
He followed that by continuing: "Well I personally think that if Osama was such a good prime minister then he should of just done it again! HAPPY DAYS #Inauguration #trump. 
Oh Ryan.
